# Question 1
Define a Cox Proportional Hazard Model (M1) for the covariates: clinic, prison, dose.

***

```{r}
library(survival)

load("addicts.rda")

M1 <- coxph(formula = Surv(time = survt, event = status) ~ clinic + prison + dose,
            data = dat)

summary(M1)
```
